concept.title: 227.7009-3 Additional clausesâ€”contracts except running royalty contracts.

conbody.p: The following clauses are examples for use in patent release and settlement agreements, and license agreements not providing for payment by the Government of a running royalty.
(a) License Grant. Insert the clause at 252.227-7004 .
(b) License Term. Insert one of the clauses at 252.227-7005 Alternate I or Alternate II, as appropriate.
